title: stencil
content:
can anyone identify this stencil?  
thanks!

| --- | --- |
| [aboine3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=aboine3.jpg) | 26.02 KB |
author: slokai

comments.content:
_Almost looks like a selfmade, stencil version of the almighty_ ‘DIN’_.. :)_  
_( But it doesnt seem to be identical to ‘ [DIN SchablonierSchrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111170101/http:/www.sendung.de/dinschablonierschrift/)’, by Marian Steinbach.. )_
_I dont think it is.. ( ‘Housebroken’ features a different ‘M’, ‘N’, ‘S’ + ‘X’, for example, than the original sample.. )_
You are right, it is close but certain characters are different …
